channel.title: Concertos of Chaos
channel.description: A Deaf Pianist Orchestrates Raw Mental Health Conversations Uncensored, Unedited, Unapologetic
channel.itunes:summary: A Deaf Pianist Orchestrates Raw Mental Health Conversations Uncensored, Unedited, Unapologetic
channel.itunes:author: Krystifer

item.title: S01E08 - "Improvised Healing: Jazz Metaphors for Personal Transformation"
item.itunes:title: S01E08 - "Improvised Healing: Jazz Metaphors for Personal Transformation"
item.description:
What's an unexpected 'musical note' in your healing journey? What happens when something unexpected pops up in your life's score? How do you handle it? How do you "improv" your way through it? Join me as we discuss unexpected notes (aka: BS) in our everyday lives and how we can improv our way through them!

EDIT 05/12/2025: this has nothing to do with jazz lol gotta love mental health!
item.content:encoded:
What's an unexpected 'musical note' in your healing journey? What happens when something unexpected pops up in your life's score? How do you handle it? How do you "improv" your way through it? Join me as we discuss unexpected notes (aka: BS) in our everyday lives and how we can improv our way through them!

EDIT 05/12/2025: this has nothing to do with jazz lol gotta love mental health!
item.itunes:author: Krystifer

item.title: S01E07 - "Sforzando Survival: When Your Amygdala Conducts the Show"
item.description: Join me as we dicuss "insane" repetitiveness and reactivity!
item.content:encoded: Join me as we dicuss "insane" repetitiveness and reactivity!
item.itunes:author: Krystifer

item.title: S01E06 - "Involuntary Harmonies: Trauma, The Media, and the Soundtrack of Familiar Chaos"
item.itunes:title: S01E06 - "Involuntary Harmonies: Trauma, The Media, and the Soundtrack of Familiar Chaos"
item.description: Join me as we discuss THE MEDIA and how it can impact your mental health. (No video, but there are graphics!)
item.content:encoded: Join me as we discuss THE MEDIA and how it can impact your mental health. (No video, but there are graphics!)
item.itunes:author: Krystifer

item.title: S01E05 - "Appoggiaturas and Fermatas: When Holding On Phucks Your Harmony"
item.itunes:title: S01E05 - "Appoggiaturas and Fermatas: When Holding On Phucks Your Harmony"
item.description: I discuss prioritizing mental health over capitalistic bullshit.
item.content:encoded: I discuss prioritizing mental health over capitalistic bullshit.

item.title: S01E04 - No episode due to mental health.

item.title: S01E03 - Living in a New Key: Breaking Free from Life's Opus
item.itunes:title: S01E03(Video) - Living in a New Key: Breaking Free from Life's Opus
item.description: Join Brandon and me on our journey breaking free from how life tells us how we should live our lives! This drive is all over the place! Hope you can follow, and enjoy!
item.content:encoded: Join Brandon and me on our journey breaking free from how life tells us how we should live our lives! This drive is all over the place! Hope you can follow, and enjoy!

item.title: S01E02 Sustained!
item.itunes:title: S01E02 Sustained!
item.description: Systemic oppression sneaks up through seemingly harmless words & rules that fuck us. Just look at history: the worst started with acceptable hate that people in power gave a thumbs up to and continues to this day. When folks with influence cosign discrimination, it gives others permission to be dicks. We can't continue to let trash be normal. And yes, it absolutely fucks with your mental health!
item.content:encoded: Systemic oppression sneaks up through seemingly harmless words & rules that fuck us. Just look at history: the worst started with acceptable hate that people in power gave a thumbs up to and continues to this day. When folks with influence cosign discrimination, it gives others permission to be dicks. We can't continue to let trash be normal. And yes, it absolutely fucks with your mental health!

When folks with influence cosign discrimination, it gives others permission to be sticks. We can't continue to let trash be normal. And yes, it absolutely phucks with your mental health!

item.title: S01E01 - Pilot
item.itunes:title: S01E01 - Introductory Pilot Episode
item.description: This pilot episode is meant to give a feel of my show. Bear with me as this first episode has all the mistakes in it like popping, clicking, and smacking of my mouth. :-) Gotta learn to walk before we can run! I hope you enjoy this episode!
